title: Getting groceries to the car
context: Ask an employee to help load bags into your vehicle.

content.bestLine: Can you help me load these bags into my car?

neutral.text: I need help with my groceries
Can you assist me with loading?
Do you offer help with carrying bags?
I could use some help getting these to my car
Is there someone who can help me load my vehicle?
Can I get some assistance with my groceries?
Do you have a cart attendant who can help me?
I'd appreciate help loading my groceries

informal.text: Hey, can you help me load my stuff?
Can you give me a hand with these bags?
I'm gonna need some help getting this to my car
Do you guys help with loading groceries?
Can someone help me carry these out?
I could really use a hand here
Can you lend me a hand with my groceries?
Need some help getting this loaded up

formal.text: I would appreciate assistance with loading my vehicle
Could you please help me load my groceries?
I require help with carrying my bags to the car
Is it possible to get help with loading my groceries?
I would like to request assistance with loading my vehicle
Could I please have help loading my groceries into my car?

patterns.template: Can you help me load [options] into my [vehicle]?
patterns.meaning: Requesting help with loading items into a vehicle

patterns.template: I need help [options] my groceries to the [location]

dialogs.description: Customer asking for help loading groceries

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Excuse me, can you help me load these bags into my car?

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.text: Of course, let me just finish scanning this customer and I'll be right with you

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Do you offer help with carrying bags to the car?

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.text: Yes, we do. Let me call someone to assist you
